name: Từ vựng các cách diễn đạt khác (Other Expressions)

words.example: I need a couple of days to finish this task.
She bought a few apples at the market.
Several students volunteered for the project.
There are many books on the shelf.

words.vietnamese: Nhiều (dùng với danh từ không đếm được)
words.example: He doesn't have much time left.
There are a lot of people at the party.
